channel.title: [Help] With Tom'c Cache editor to remove runescape letters on client
channel.description: Well on my client wallpaper it shows these Runescape letters that are really annoying and i really really need to take them out. Someone told me to use tom's cache to remove them but I don't know how to, so if you guys could help me out it would be amazing! Thanks! [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/66i3pg.png[/img]

item.title: [Help] With Tom'c Cache editor to remove runescape letters on client
item.dc:creator: @Austin9999 Austin9999
item.description:
@Austin9999 wrote:

Hey, how did you get the bowls of fire gone?

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] With Tom'c Cache editor to remove runescape letters on client
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Load that image, dump it (or export, whatever the option is) Save it as .png format.

Make the whole thing magenta (the bright purple, which is already there, just make the whole thing that color)

Then import it to that archive, replacing the file.

Save cache, rebuild etc.[/quote]

Thanks man.

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] With Tom'c Cache editor to remove runescape letters on client
